html:
12.15.19  1:39 am   If you could take an average of all the emotions you've ever felt, what number would you get? 

     15

12.15.19  1:29 am   Is a sense of rhythm something that can be developed or if I tap off beat am I doomed? 

     you could make your own beat

12.15.19  1:28 am   Is the opposite of a question an answer,

     yes

      or some strange form of anti-question that obliterates any question it comes into contact with?

12.15.19  1:11 am   two questions: have you ever said the word "permanently" in a song you've written and finished,

     i don't think so

      and if so, which song

12.15.19  12:56 am   I am frustrated by ambiguity, uncertainty, and open endedness. Does this make me a less effective human?

     i'm not sure. what do you think?

      Should I try to not be this way? 

     we'll see

12.15.19  12:54 am   I like the ways that snows snowing in night. Pretty dark, calm and peaceful. How do you think about the ways weathers weathering ?

     pretty good

12.15.19  12:42 am   should we pursue happiness or convince ourselves that what we have is happiness?

     happiness will pursue you. you cannot escape

12.15.19  12:30 am   What is your favorite type of bread

     anything other than short bread. prefer bread of very tall or average size

12.15.19  12:22 am   How do you best advise to hide from the fat man? The jolly man? I beg you bill, my time is running out.

     can't. you must fight him. be even more jolly, give him a taste of his own medicine

12.15.19  12:22 am   If one of your songs physically manifested itself in 3-D space as a poisonous frog, what would you do?

     post it online but without the poison

12.15.19  12:18 am   How do I make people I love feel as good with as much as i fell good with them?

     smoke and mirrors!

12.15.19  12:09 am   what is wrong with you

     i'm a princess

12.15.19  12:05 am   how long can a question be? 

     very short

12.14.19  11:43 pm   Is food edible

     no way

12.14.19  11:28 pm   hi are you a human person

     oh that would explain a lot

12.14.19  10:59 pm   Is creativity something that can be learned?

     yes

      If so, can you teach me?

     i'll try but you have to teach yourself

12.14.19  10:48 pm   do you think a few guys could start a rival blue man group and call it red man group (or teal man group)

     yes

12.14.19  10:47 pm   i don't think you and i have the same process or the same goals musically but i am still curious about your opinion. i'm putting together a set of songs that are basically a religious service like there are liturgical functions for each one except the religion is fictional and this is a sort of alternate universe where everybody knows what to do in this kind of service so it's gotta sound both deeply ingrained and spontaneous so there are no instruments it's all singing, stomping and clapping. the constraint i gave myself to keep this project from taking 8 khgpillion years was that every single first-track take has to be improvised and then i stack more improvising as reactions on top of that track. fastest one (there should be about 16 when i am done, rn i have 5) took 2 hours, slowest one took 2 weeks because the initial improv was both extremely irregular and extremely precise and i had to basically learn it to improvise over and react to it in a way tha t sounded good to me. FINALLY A QUESTION FOR YOU do you think if you engaged in this sort of improvise-stack-more-no-precomposing-allowed that you'd let yourself get more weird and less polished or would you allow so much re-improvising that it eventually just became a kind of postcomposition? i am having some trouble with the bits of the improvs i don't think are as successful; should i allow chop-ups or is the one-initial-take rule a good one? i thought i could get this done faster if i hobbled my perfectionism by specifying ONLY spontaneous improv allowed, but there are so many ways to elude the spirit of that law and no external deadline requiring i actually do it any faster. what u think

     it sounds like a good idea in theory, but i've tried that sort of thing and it definitely does not work for me. what does work however, is to do a lot of improv and use certain bits for writing purposes. what also works well is to try to write very fast

12.14.19  10:34 pm   What would you do with tree bones?

     plant them

12.14.19  10:20 pm   whats ur favourite character

     planet earth

12.14.19  10:15 pm   how do you feel about the number 14?

     good

12.14.19  10:09 pm   is it weird to procrastinate for something i enjoy doing?

     almost

12.14.19  10:08 pm   Do I exist?

     as of 10:08 pm you absolutely did

12.14.19  10:06 pm   Are you a thing?

     person, place or

12.14.19  9:39 pm   Is there a particular reason you used the phrase Indus River Valley Civilization over the other name, the Harappan civilization? If so, what was it?

     indus river valley seemed to be the more common name, at the time of my research. it never occured to me to say harappan. harappan did not seem like the de facto name for it, at the time of my research

12.14.19  9:33 pm   WHAT IF I WROTE AN ENTIRE ESSAY FOR SCHOOL IN FULL CAPS? WHAT WOULD HAPPEN? WHAT IF I ONLY WROTE IN CAPS FOR THE REST OF MY LIFE? 

     you might be sent to jail unless the jail is already full

12.14.19  9:05 pm   What was the first song you ever played on the Piano?

     probably twinkle twinkle little star

12.14.19  8:49 pm   Are you trying to be cryptic or is it just the way you do stuff?

     i am trying to perform cryptography. trying to solve the cryptographs

12.14.19  8:38 pm   bill, i am forced to write a bunch of Absolute Bullshit and i hate it, what do i do

     place your tongue into the general vicinity of your cheek

12.14.19  8:37 pm   the pirates have looted the booty

     so true

12.14.19  8:35 pm   What's your opinion on Rotary Phones?

     good exercise. instead of going to the gym we used to just make phone calls

12.14.19  8:20 pm   how do i calm down when i'm stressed?

     sing a song

12.14.19  8:10 pm   i want to create nice music but i don't have ideas. help

     try creating awful terrible music, and as you do that you will find that niceness will grow, right out of the muck

12.14.19  7:53 pm   how do you keep track of who said what lol

     no one ever says anything. still waiting for someone to say something

12.14.19  6:23 pm   What's your favourite chord extension?

     the melody

12.14.19  6:02 pm   Who invented the thing inventer that invented the thing inventer?

     you'll have to do it

12.14.19  5:36 pm   How can I get from Earth to Mars without using a rocketships NASA made?

     try space X

12.14.19  5:23 pm   What is a cool piano song to learn

     rondo alla turca

12.14.19  4:40 pm   Do you like rockets

     they are boring most of the time, but at blast off time i must say i can't resist

12.14.19  3:55 pm   why are songs your so inspiring

     to inspire the share holders

12.14.19  3:51 pm   My brother is being rude what should I do?

     criticize him for being rude

12.14.19  3:49 pm   Do you like puzzles? Specifically the ones that involve matching jagged cardboard pieces together in a way that forms an image that is advertised on the container, usually a box, that the puzzle is sold in.

     they are pretty good but they would be better if they would come alive at the end

12.14.19  3:16 pm   how many parents have you parented

     none so far

12.14.19  2:53 pm   is it too late/early to ask a question?

     not late/early enough

12.14.19  2:51 pm   What's the most important thing to put on a resume?

     say you are dynamic

12.14.19  2:44 pm   what should i get for christmas

     a new year

12.14.19  2:42 pm   how do you decide which questions to answer? do you choose the funny, weird, or serious questions more?

     i can't tell the difference

12.14.19  2:38 pm   Bill this isn't really a question but more of a suggestion I think it would be really cool if we got to see a history of the universe video but I'm sure you're very busy so hopefully you see this

     i'm pretty sure i included that in history of the entire world. "world" i was considering to mean universe

12.14.19  2:31 pm   opinion on broken silk?

     fix it!!!!

12.14.19  2:27 pm   since the letter c can sound like either the letter k or the letter s you could technichally spell sksksksks as cccccccc help.

     get a glass of water, take calm, steady breaths. go for a walk
